DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Effect Dapagliflozin When Administered Once Day Versus Twice Day Blood Glucose
DOC.criteria: Female healthy volunteer must postmenopausal ( cessation menses > 1year , surgically sterile ( document ) undergone hysterectomy ) sexually abstinent enrolment followup examination Have normal physical exam , vital sign ECG finding , laboratory value Use prescription medication chronic acute medical condition within 3 week randomization History presence neurological , haematological , psychiatric , gastrointestinal , hepatic renal disease , condition know interfere absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion drug determine Investigator Previous participation AstraZeneca ( AZ ) BristolMyers Squibb ( BMS ) dapagliflozin study
